  • Method Details

    • canPassThroughBlock

      default Boolean canPassThroughBlock(LaserContext ctx, net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state, net.minecraft.world.level.BlockGetter level, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos)
      canPassThroughBlock will be invoked when a laser passing a block. You can invoke LaserContext.cancel() to immediately cancel further processing.
      Parameters:
      ctx - The LaserContext
      state - The BlockState of the hitting block
      level - The level of the hitting block
      pos - The position of the hitting block
      Returns:
      Boolean.TRUE if the block is passable, Boolean.FALSE if the block is not passable, or null if unknown, which will invoke next checker.
      See Also:
      • LaserContext.cancel()

    • beforeProcessLaserOnBlock

      default void beforeProcessLaserOnBlock(LaserContext ctx, net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos, ILaserProcessor processor)
      beforeProcessLaserOnBlock will be invoked before the laser is going to process a block. You can invoke LaserContext.cancel() to cancel further processing, and LaserContext.getHitResult() will return the HitResult.
      Parameters:
      ctx - The LaserContext
      state - The BlockState of the hitting block
      pos - The position of the hitting block
      processor - The processor, will never be null
      See Also:
      • afterProcessLaserOnBlock(net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserContext,net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState,net.minecraft.core.BlockPos)
      • LaserContext.cancel()
      • LaserContext.getHitResult()
      • ILaserProcessor.isEndPoint()

    • afterProcessLaserOnBlock

      default void afterProcessLaserOnBlock(LaserContext ctx, net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState oldState, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos)
      afterProcessLaserOnBlock will be invoked after the laser processed a block.
      Parameters:
      ctx - The LaserContext
      oldState - The block's BlockState before laser processed
      pos - The block's position
      See Also:
      • beforeProcessLaserOnBlock(net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserContext,net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState,net.minecraft.core.BlockPos,net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.ILaserProcessor)

    • beforeProcessLaserOnEntity

      default void beforeProcessLaserOnEntity(LaserContext ctx, net.minecraft.world.entity.Entity entity, ILaserProcessor processor)
      beforeProcessLaserOnEntity will be invoked before the laser is going to process an entity. You can invoke LaserContext.cancel() to cancel further processing, and LaserContext.getHitResult() will return the HitResult.
      Parameters:
      ctx - The LaserContext
      entity - The Entity of the hitting entity
      processor - The processor, will never be null
      See Also:
      • afterProcessLaserOnEntity(net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserContext,net.minecraft.world.entity.Entity)
      • LaserContext.cancel()
      • LaserContext.getHitResult()
      • ILaserProcessor.isEndPoint()

    • afterProcessLaserOnEntity

      default void afterProcessLaserOnEntity(LaserContext ctx, net.minecraft.world.entity.Entity entity)
      afterProcessLaserOnEntity will be invoked after the laser processed an entity.
      Parameters:
      ctx - The LaserContext
      entity - The Entity of the hitting entity
      See Also:
      • beforeProcessLaserOnEntity(net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserContext,net.minecraft.world.entity.Entity,net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.ILaserProcessor)

    • beforeMergeLaser

      default void beforeMergeLaser(LaserContext ctx, LaserContext target)
      beforeMergeLaser will be invoked before the attached laser is merging to another. After this method is invoked, the attachment will never be use again on the original context. You can invoke LaserContext.cancel() to cancel the merge and further processing on the laser.
      Parameters:
      ctx - The attached LaserContext
      target - The LaserContext which going to be merge to
      See Also:
      • afterMergeLaser(net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserContext,net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserContext,net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserProperties)
      • LaserContext.cancel()

    • afterMergeLaser

      default void afterMergeLaser(LaserContext ctx, LaserContext target, LaserProperties props)
      afterMergeLaser will be invoked after the attached laser is merged to another. If needed, attachment can attach itself to the target laser in this method.
      Parameters:
      ctx - The attached LaserContext
      target - The LaserContext which being merged to
      props - The target laser's LaserProperties
      See Also:
      • beforeMergeLaser(net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserContext,net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserContext)
